actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, to provide, in certain instances, up to 18 months of additional educational assistance for graduate or professional study.

summary.text: Provides additional educational assistance for a period of up to 18 months for graduate or professional study to eligible veterans who: (1) have received educational assistance (under chapter 34 of title 38, U.S. Code) for 36 months, or (under section 1791 of title 38) for 48 months; and (2) have completed at least 1 year of graduate or professional study. (Amend 38 U.S.C. 1661, 1662, 1791)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, to provide, in certain instances, up to 18 months of additional educational assistance for graduate or professional study.
